::: {.Header-sc-7f1l39-0 .csuIpz}
Bluetooth Keyboard Shortcuts Unresponsive

Close Feedback
:::

::: {.Thread-sc-131cgoo-0 .btpJsY}
::: {.ThreadItem-hd1169-0 .tAbqA}
::: {.Status-viscvg-0 .ffrfii}
::: {.Status__StatusRow-viscvg-1 .jbFpOm}
[Recent Similar Reports:]{.Status__StatusLabel-viscvg-2
.dNACOy}[None]{.Status__StatusValue-viscvg-3 .deOjtz}
:::

::: {.Status__StatusRow-viscvg-1 .jbFpOm}
[Resolution:]{.Status__StatusLabel-viscvg-2
.dNACOy}[Open]{.Status__StatusValue-viscvg-3 .deOjtz}
:::

:::

::: {.Thread-sc-131cgoo-0 .bEuPnA}
::: {.ThreadItem-hd1169-0 .tAbqA}
::: {.Section-sc-1od1pyd-0 .hQJjAv}
::: {.Description-sc-1dh2iyq-0 .kmYDAA}
Basic Information
:::

::: {.Header-pmfobz-0 .fFAhxH}
Please provide a descriptive title for your feedback:
:::

::: {.Body-sc-177rw67-0 .ddGsdx}
Bluetooth Keyboard Shortcuts Unresponsive
:::

::: {.Header-pmfobz-0 .fFAhxH}
Which area are you seeing an issue with?
:::

::: {.Body-sc-177rw67-0 .ddGsdx}
Keyboard
:::

::: {.Header-pmfobz-0 .fFAhxH}
What type of feedback are you reporting?
:::

::: {.Body-sc-177rw67-0 .ddGsdx}
Incorrect/Unexpected Behavior
:::
:::

::: {.Section-sc-1od1pyd-0 .hQJjAv}
::: {.Description-sc-1dh2iyq-0 .kmYDAA}
Details
:::

::: {.Header-pmfobz-0 .fFAhxH}
Is this a keyboard or autocorrection issue?
:::

::: {.Body-sc-177rw67-0 .ddGsdx}
Keyboard
:::

::: {.Header-pmfobz-0 .fFAhxH}
Are you using an onscreen software keyboard, or hardware keyboard?
:::

::: {.Body-sc-177rw67-0 .ddGsdx}
Hardware Keyboard
:::

::: {.Header-pmfobz-0 .fFAhxH}
Which keyboard was selected when the issue occurred?
:::

::: {.Body-sc-177rw67-0 .ddGsdx}
Bluetooth Magic Keyboard
:::

::: {.Header-pmfobz-0 .fFAhxH}
Is the problem occurring in just one app?
:::

::: {.Body-sc-177rw67-0 .ddGsdx}
No, it happens in multiple apps
:::

::: {.Header-pmfobz-0 .fFAhxH}
What is the model and language layout of your hardware keyboard?
:::

::: {.Body-sc-177rw67-0 .ddGsdx}
Magic Keyboard with Numeric Keypad - US English - Space Gray
:::

::: {.Header-pmfobz-0 .fFAhxH}
Does this issue relate to Siri Suggestions?
:::

::: {.Body-sc-177rw67-0 .ddGsdx}
No
:::
:::

::: {.Section-sc-1od1pyd-0 .hQJjAv}
::: {.Description-sc-1dh2iyq-0 .kmYDAA}
Description
:::

::: {.Header-pmfobz-0 .fFAhxH}
Please describe the issue and what steps we can take to reproduce it:
:::

::: {.Body-sc-177rw67-0 .ddGsdx}
Feb 4, 2021 at 13:40 Note: this issue has occurred with Full Keyboard
Access turned \~OFF\~. During the course of normal usage in Safari,
Bear, Drafts, and Tweetbot, I have experienced four instances now
(seemingly untriggered,) where keyboard shortcuts have ceased working.
(Example shortcuts: ⌘ + Up and Down arrows, Unmodified Up and Down
arrows to scroll, ⌘ + \[ and \], ⌘+L. I can list more examples if it'd
be useful.) I have tried toggling the handset's Bluetooth function
on/off both in the Command Center and in Settings with no effect.
Keyboard reconnects but the shortcuts are still unresponsive. The same
goes for switching the keyboard itself on and off. The only solution
appears to be rebooting the handset. At this time, I don't know what
causes this issue. It's happened seemingly at random. - - - - Feb 4,
2021 at 23:56 The issue occurred again just a few minutes ago, so I
searched out and installed the Bluetooth Logging Profile from the
Developer website and (apparently) successfully triggered a syslog using
the \[both volume buttons + side button\] command, though \*\*I DID NOT
REBOOT THE DEVICE\*\* between installing the profile and triggering the
syslog because it would have corrected the issue before I could log it.
I have attached both the syslog file and a short screen recording
(including my audio commentary) of the shortcuts not working in Safari.
If it's important, I believe the device was still capturing this log
while I was recording this screen recording.
:::
:::

::: {.Section-sc-1od1pyd-0 .hQJjAv}
::: {.Description-sc-1dh2iyq-0 .kmYDAA}
